thread.section_title: Hotel Royal Saint Michel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: great location and nice hotel
thread.title_full: great location and nice hotel - Review of Hotel Royal Saint Michel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: S B
title: great location and nice hotel
text:
nice hotel in the heart of st. Michel. 20 steps from the metro M4.the room is nice and cleen. comfortable and well equiped. a beat bigger then other rooms i've been in Paris.very confortable bed. very small elevator but better the nothing.
The breakfast is good and worth the price of 16 euro. better then to eat outside for almost the same price and to get much less.. the stuff are nice and polite. Nespresso machine in the lobby free of charge . a beat noisy sometimes
